events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
Assigning agent Helen to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! This is Helen from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the item you received.
Could you please provide the order number and photos of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
My order number is 4589237. I've attached the photos showing the incorrect item and its packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help resolving this so promptly.
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now resolved. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
